Name: Assault on Hyperion Base
About the game: After a distress call was received from Hyperion Base you have been sent out to secure and reclaim this advanced research facility. Discover what project A.N.D.R.O.I.D really is and what happened to the team that was stationed there. Assault on Hyperion Base is a top down twin stick shooter playable with both keyboard and controller. Play through all three levels and try to beat and set your own highscores!
